body.name: Mini Dustpan and Brush Set Wood Small Metal Dust Pan Natural Table Top Handy Brush for Sweeping
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 33 mins
features: COMPACE AND ELEGANT DESIGN.The brush and the back panel of the pan have a small magnet in to keep them neatly together.Sturdy little table brush. Perfect size for tabletop sweeping .

BUILT OF STURDY MATERIALS AND WELL CONSTRUCTED . A metallic dustpan, with a natural wooden back panel to hold. Sturdy little table brush. The brush has decent length soft bristles, which would be ideal for not scratching surfaces.
CONVENIENT TO USE.Good quality broom for small spaces,all over the house or car. Easy to hold and clean small places with.
EASY STORAG.The broom fits in the dustpan making for easy packing.Fits in the drawer.
body.description: Easy to use.This little tabletop dustpan set is ideal for sweeping away crumbs, stray coffee grounds or pet food. Used to collect fine wood debris, dust and ash from around the woodburner.Magnetic connector to keep pan and brush tidied together.Great little table top brush and pan set.Practical and handy.Ideal for brushing crumbs off the table and keeping countertops clean.Bristles are not too harsh and pick up the smallest amount of debris.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: This Mini Dustpan and Brush Set is great to clear up the bread crumbs off the table, flour/sugar/salt off the counter when I bake. I like that it's so compact and I can store it in the kitchen drawer. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it
reviews.reviewText: I use it for my espresso set up and it works great to sweep up the loose coffee grounds. Love the fact there is a magnet that keeps the brush attached to the dustbin - looks good too. Extremely happy with the purchase. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Use this to clean my indoor quail house. I can easily scoop and dump with the little dust pan and use the broom to tidy around their house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute, and works great!
reviews.reviewText: I got this to put next to the cat box to sweep up the litter that gets on the floor. It’s so cute and low-profile! I love that the two parts magnet together. Very simple and effective design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my nearly 3yo
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been getting my son involved in household work since the very first moment he could sit up, and I bought lots of fully functional “his size” tools like little brooms, bissel featherweight vacuum, shortened swiffer, and the hand broom and dust pan set from ikea. But he could never REALLY use those things (and always wanted the full adult size any way, sticking me with the child size lol), he struggled especially with the movement required for the hand broom (the kind with a handle that requires a more left to right motion).Somebody on Instagram had their toddler using this one so I decided to try one more child sized cleaning tool. And I’m glad I did. This is perfect! My son can actually use it. If I tell him to sweep up his crumbs or kinetic sand he threw out if the container, I can walk away and come back to find he actually swept up most of it and it’s not just scattered around more or hiding UNDER the dustpan.It gives my son a sense of accomplishment and independence and he loves to grab it and clean things up! Perfect for Montessori followers or those just looking to teach their children to have respect for their homes.I LOVE the little magnet that holds the pieces together also!! Very well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Should have remembered these long ago!
reviews.reviewText: I bake and decorate dozens of cookies every year, and cleaning off the table with a dish cloth or sponge almost always leaves some sticky residue somewhere! This year, I used thus table brush to clean off crumbs and sugar and NEVER had the "This table is sticky" comment once!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars such a useful little tool
reviews.reviewText: This product is small, well-designed, and perfect for my needs: to sweep away scraps of stamp block material from my carving station. It would work equally well for woodcarvers, woodworkers, or anyone who needs to brush away (into the accompanying dustpan) small amounts of dry material. The magnet that attaches the brush to the dustpan is suitably strong.
